Is this where I talk about myself?

I’m a designer from Vancouver, currently taking a two-year break from my studies at the University of Waterloo to do back-to-back internships instead; more-or-less playing hooky. I’ve designed for Manulife, Intersect, HVF Labs, and most recently, Microsoft
